data.text:
Staying at Esperia Bellevue Suites was an extraordinary experience. This small boutique hotel with only 13 suites is located directly at the beach. Our suite was spacious, modern, clean, equipped with everything you need and more (fridge, coffee maker, even a washing machine) and had a stunning view. We only used the small rooftop pool once - the weather allowed for bathing in the sea, which was even more attractive! 
But what really made our stay special was the team. The hotel manager Katerina made sure all our needs were met and inquired in person several times whether everything was alright or anything could be done better. Theodorus greeted us in the morning and made sure the breakfast made our day (it's your choice whether you want to have breakfast served in your room or downstairs in the breakfast room - no buffet, you have the full choice from a menu and the team will try to meet all your wishes). Nikos welcomed us in the afternoons and made sure we got a reserved table in fabulous restaurants each night and always had good suggestions on where to go and what to see next. Room service was fabulous as well. Big thanks to the whole team!
One thing you shouldn't expect: getting to know other guests. The whole atmosphere is meant for privacy, it's quiet. Although we were here in January we don't think this will be very different in the more busy times of the year
data.title: Quiet small place with fabulous service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Katja R,

Thank you for sharing your delightful experience at Bellevue On The Beach Suites! We are thrilled to learn that your stay with us was an extraordinary experience.

It warms our hearts to hear that you enjoyed the spacious, modern, and well-equipped suite with a stunning view. It sounds like the small rooftop pool and the proximity to the beach added to the charm of your stay, especially with the favorable weather for sea bathing.

Your kind words about our team are truly appreciated. We're delighted that Katerina, Theodorus, and Nikos contributed to making your stay special. We'll make sure to share your praises with them. It's wonderful to know that the personalized attention, from inquiring about your needs to providing dining recommendations and excellent room service, made a positive impact on your overall experience.

We understand and appreciate your mention of the hotel's atmosphere designed for privacy and tranquility. It's great to hear that this aspect resonated with your expectations.

Thank you for choosing Bellevue On The Beach Suites, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay in the future.

Best Regards,
Chris Zamagia
Public Relations & Communications Director
Esperia Group

data.text:
What an amazing boutique hotel!!!  We were greeted with a cocktail while Nico gave us an overview of the hotel and the services available. For example, we had the choice of having breakfast delivered directly to our suite, or we could have eaten in the dining area. We opted for a breakfast in our room every morning, which was delivered by Dimitris, with a smile.
We also had our own kitchen facilities, if we desired to use them. The room service was twice a day. The suite was large, spacious, clean, and decorated in a contemporary manner. The bed was very comfortable, and we really appreciated having two bathrooms in the suite. The view of the Aegean Sea was heavenly!Staff were very accommodating to ALL of our needs.
data.title: Top Notch Boutique Hotel in Rhodes, Greece
